samples.context: At a hospital, every patient who receives compassionate care feels reassured. Every patient who receives compassionate care also heals faster.
samples.question: Does it entail that if a patient receives compassionate care at the hospital, then they feel reassured and heal faster?

samples.context: In a farm, every cow that grazes in the meadow produces milk. Every cow that grazes in the meadow also gains weight.
samples.question: Does it entail that if a cow grazes in the meadow on the farm, then it produces milk and gains weight?

samples.context: In a company, every employee who arrives early is punctual. Every employee who arrives early also starts work promptly.
samples.question: Does it entail that if an employee arrives early at the company, then they are punctual and start work promptly?

samples.context: In a company, every employee who innovates earns promotions. Every employee who innovates also impresses the boss.
samples.question: Does it entail that if an employee innovates in the company, then they earn promotions and impress the boss?

samples.context: In a gym, anyone who lifts weights builds muscle. Anyone who lifts weights also becomes stronger.
samples.question: Does it entail that if someone lifts weights in the gym, then they build muscle and become stronger?

samples.context: In a playground, every child who plays nice shares toys. Every child who plays nice also makes friends.
samples.question: Does it entail that if a child plays nice in the playground, then they share toys and make friends?

samples.context: At a party, every guest who socializes has fun. Every guest who socializes also meets new people.
samples.question: Does it entail that if a guest socializes at the party, then they have fun and meet new people?

samples.context: In a farm, every animal that stays healthy reproduces. Every animal that stays healthy also lives longer.
samples.question: Does it entail that if an animal stays healthy on the farm, then it reproduces and lives longer?

samples.context: On a team, any player who trains hard becomes fitter. Any player who trains hard also improves their skills.
samples.question: Does it entail that if a player trains hard on the team, then they become fitter and improve their skills?

samples.context: In a family, any child who eats healthy food grows stronger. Any child who eats healthy food also has more energy.
samples.question: Does it entail that if a child eats healthy food in the family, then they grow stronger and have more energy?
